SECRET.
G.T.6876.
WAR CABINET.
SOLDIERS' & SAILORS' PAY COMMITTEE.
SUPPLEMENTATION AND OTHER ASSISTANCE TO THE ARMIES OF OCCUPATION.
At their 47th. Meeting on the 19th. February 1919 the Soldiers' and Sailors' Pay Committee had under consideration the question of Continuance of Supplementation and other Assistance to the Armies of Occupation.
It was agreed:-
(a) That the principle of Supplementation would have to continue in the case of men retained to form the Armies of Occupation.
(b) That the Ministry of Pensions should undertake the administration of Supplementation.
25th. February, 1919.
(Sd.) A. Geddes.
2, Whitehall Gardens, S.W.
25th. February, 1919.
